segments.text: Excuse me , Mr . White ? I just need you to sign these before I leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Sherry . Sorry to have kept you waiting . If you hadn ’ t told me , I probably would have just forgotten all about them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s my job , sir . Just one more signature here , please .
segments.speaker: S1
